title: Tech firms seek push for AI, innovation, digital infrastructure in Budget
description: The Economic Survey tabled in Parliament on January 29 has recognised Artificial Intelligence (AI) as an economic strategy rather than a prestige technology race. It made a strong case for a bottom-up, multiple sector-specific approach grounded in open and interoperable systems to promote collaboration and shared innovation.
content:

title: How Technology is Decoding Our Cosmic Blueprint
description: In the last decade, we have witnessed a fascinating shift in how ancient practices intersect with modern technology. title: KP to introduce AI in school curriculum from Grade 6
description: The Khyber Pakhtunkhwa government has decided to formally introduce Artificial Intelligence (AI) as part of the school curriculum from grade six to grade twelve,
content:
